mapper.select: select personid AS code,personname AS name,guid AS number,card AS idCardNo,age,gendercode AS gender,facepath AS headUrl,suspectstatuscode AS stateCode,violationcode AS violateCode,suspectstatus AS state,bailoutbegindate AS execStartDate, bailoutenddate AS execEndDate,contact AS phone FROM t_personinformation WHERE sponsoralarm=#{UserId} AND status=true ORDER BY t_personinformation.personname
select id AS code,settingname AS name,settingcheck AS enable FROM t_prisonsetting WHERE personid=#{personid}
select * FROM t_location WHERE personid=#{personid}
select * FROM t_reportsettings
select * FROM t_singin WHERE personid=#{personid} AND type=#{type}
select * FROM t_summons WHERE t_summons.reporttime is not null ORDER BY t_summons.summontime DESC
select * FROM t_summons WHERE personname LIKE'%${key}%' AND t_summons.reporttime is not null ORDER BY t_summons.summontime DESC
select * FROM t_personinformation WHERE personid=#{personid}
select * FROM t_personinformation WHERE personname=#{personName}
mapper.update: update t_summons set reporttime= #{date.summonsTime} where id = (select id from t_summons where personid=#{date.personid} AND "date"(summonsendtime) > #{date.summonsTime} AND "date"(summonsbegintime) <= #{date.summonsTime} and reporttime is NULL LIMIT 1)
mapper.select: select leaveorder AS code,statuscode AS statusCode,states AS status,personname AS applicant,subittimestamp AS applyTimestamp,starttimestamp AS startTimestamp,endtimestamp AS endTimestamp, leavedestination AS address,reason,recording AS reasonAudioUrl FROM t_leave ORDER BY t_leave.subittimestamp DESC
select statuscode AS statusCode,states AS status,auditordatetime AS timestamp,accountname AS person FROM t_auditor WHERE leaveorder=#{leaveOrder} ORDER BY auditordatetime

select leaveorder AS code,statuscode AS statusCode,states AS status,personname AS applicant,subittimestamp AS applyTimestamp,starttimestamp AS startTimestamp,endtimestamp AS endTimestamp, leavedestination AS address,reason,recording AS reasonAudioUrl FROM t_leave WHERE statuscode=#{statusCode} ORDER BY t_leave.subittimestamp DESC

select leaveorder AS code,statuscode AS statusCode,states AS status,personname AS applicant,subittimestamp AS applyTimestamp,starttimestamp AS startTimestamp,endtimestamp AS endTimestamp, leavedestination AS address,reason,recording AS reasonAudioUrl FROM t_leave WHERE personname LIKE'%${key}%' ORDER BY t_leave.subittimestamp DESC

select leaveorder AS code,statuscode AS statusCode,states AS status,personname AS applicant,subittimestamp AS applyTimestamp,starttimestamp AS startTimestamp,endtimestamp AS endTimestamp, leavedestination AS address,reason,recording AS reasonAudioUrl FROM t_leave WHERE statuscode=#{statusCode} AND personname LIKE'%${key}%' ORDER BY t_leave.subittimestamp DESC

select leaveorder AS code,statuscode AS statusCode,states AS status,personname AS applicant,subittimestamp AS applyTimestamp,starttimestamp AS startTimestamp,endtimestamp AS endTimestamp, leavedestination AS address,reason,recording AS reasonAudioUrl FROM t_leave WHERE leaveorder=#{leaveOrder}
select * from t_leave where leaveorder=#{leaveOrder}
mapper.update: update t_leave set statuscode=#{statusCode},states=#{status} WHERE leaveorder=#{leaveOrder}
mapper.insert: insert into t_auditor (leaveorder, userid, leavingmessage, statuscode, states, accountname, auditordatetime) VALUES (#{leaveOrder},#{userId},#{leavingMessage},#{statusCode},#{status},#{accountName},#{auditorDateTime})
mapper.select: select * FROM t_remindersettings WHERE code='0000000003'
select rangefens FROM t_violationfens WHERE violationname=#{violationName} AND code=#{Code}
select * FROM t_singin WHERE personid=#{personId} AND type=#{type}
SELECT * FROM t_summons WHERE personid=#{personId}
SELECT areaarr FROM t_enclosure WHERE personid=#{personId} AND status=TRUE
SELECT citycode FROM t_enclosure WHERE personid=#{personId} AND status=TRUE
SELECT latitude,longitude,locationtype AS locationType,address,fscope AS isOutBound,timestamp FROM t_location WHERE personid=#{personId} And latitude is not null ORDER BY t_location.timestamp DESC
select * FROM t_location where personid=#{personId} AND fscope=true
select * FROM t_singin
select * FROM t_prisonsetting WHERE personid=#{personId} AND settingname=#{validName}
mapper.update: update t_prisonsetting set settingcheck=#{settingCheck},settingtime=#{settingTime} WHERE personid=#{personId} AND settingname=#{settingName}
mapper.select: select settingcode AS code,settingname AS name,settingcheck AS enable FROM t_prisonsetting WHERE personid=#{personId}

select casecategory AS caseCategory,casetype AS caseType,casename AS caseName,caseno AS caseNo,receivedtime AS registerTime,handleunit AS handleUnit, handlepeson AS handlePeson,mainperson AS mainHandlePeson,casedescription AS caseDescription FROM t_caseinfo WHERE personid=#{personId}
select guaranteename AS name,gender,card AS idCardNo,address,workunit AS unit,job,contact,relatetionship AS relationship FROM t_guaranteeinformation where personid=#{personId}
select money AS amount,paydate AS payDate,keepbank AS keepBank FROM t_guaranteeinformation WHERE personid=#{personId}
select enumname FROM t_enum WHERE typecode=#{typeCode} AND enumcode=#{enumCode}
select * FROM t_summons WHERE t_summons.reporttime is null ORDER BY t_summons.summontime DESC
select * from t_user where accountname=#{userId}
